## @ebay/protego-client-ebay

The module provides access to Protego Certificate Storage

### Install

```bash
yarn add @ebay/protego-client-ebay
```

### Usage

```js
const { ProtegoClient } = require('@ebay/protego-client-ebay');
const client = new ProtegoClient();
const certHolder = await client.getCertificateByChannel('secure.fidelius.mongo.keypair', -1);
```

### API

* getCertificateByChannel(channelName: String, version: Number): { certificate: X509Certificate, version: Number }
* getCertificateBySerial(serial: String, issuer: String): { certificate: X509Certificate, version: Number }
* getCertificates(channelName: String, version: Number): [ X509Certificate ]

Example: 

```js
const certHolder = await client.getCertificateByChannel('secure.fidelius.mongo.keypair', -1);
const { certificate, version } = certHolder; // certificate is X509Certificate object

const certHolder = await client.getCertificateByChannel('C=US, O=eBay Inc, CN=eBay SSL CA v2 - A', '5B00010CF7B42A542002414E4F000100010CF7');
const { certificate, version } = certHolder; // certificate is X509Certificate object

const certificates = await client.getCertificateByChannel('secure.fidelius.mongo.keypair', -1); // and array of X509Certificate objects
```
